Increases Ice Attack and decreases Fire Attack. Enhances some ice magic skills. Immediately removes all frozen and frostbitten status effects around you. Cannot be used with a shield.

Greatly increases Glacial Spike, Glacial Freeze, and Frost Chaos damage. Replaces the frozen debuff with the frostbitten debuff.
